Samsung’s biggest new phone in years may launch in the US this year - CNN
articles.description: The longtime rivalry between the world’s two largest smartphone makers is about to enter its next phase as Samsung prepares to launch its first tri-folding smartphone.

articles.title: Galaxy S25 One UI 8 update is now rolling out worldwide - SamMobile
articles.description: Samsung had promised that it would begin the One UI 8 stable roll out in September, and the company has followed through on its commitment. On September 15, South Korea becoming the first country to receive the stable One UI 8 update for the Galaxy S25 series…

articles.title: Meta Connect 2025 live updates: Ray-Ban Display, Oakley Vanguard glasses, more - ZDNET
articles.description: Meta has unveiled its first display-enabled smart glasses, refreshed its Ray-Ban lineup, and launch several other things at Connect.

articles.description: Joining the 'Nintendo Classics' library next week

articles.title: Meta launches Hyperscape, technology to turn real-world spaces into VR - TechCrunch
articles.description: Meta launches Hyperscape into beta, allowing users to turn real world spaces into digital spaces for VR.
